definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The seventh commenter came in with Nazi analogy employed; Godwin’s law invoked.
sentences.chinese: 七樓用高德溫法則將此文與納粹主義進行類比。

sentences.english: But the Kissingers were a Jewish family in a Germany that was on the brink of Nazism.
sentences.chinese: 當時納粹主義正在德國興起，而基辛格一家是猶太人。

sentences.english: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 新納粹主義正在德國的一些地方復活。

sentences.english: Paradoxically, Italy needed the war of Hitlerite nazism.
sentences.chinese: 荒謬的是，意大利求助於希特勒納粹主義的戰爭。

sentences.english: There have been claims that an exhibit of this nature would attract neo-Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲這種性質的展品會吸引新納粹主義。

sentences.english: Look at the ideals of Nazism.
But the Kissingers were a Jewish family in a Germany that was on the brink of Nazism .
sentences.chinese: 當時納粹主義正在德國興起，而基辛格一家是猶太人。

sentences.english: What do I make of the way the historical scale of Nazism drifts in and out of this poem?
sentences.chinese: 我如何理解納粹主義在這首詩中淡入淡出的歷史氛圍？

sentences.english: After WW II this discussion was continued by prominent neo-fascist ideologues.
sentences.chinese: 在二戰後，這種討論爲主要的新納粹主義分子所繼續。
